title: Unable to connect to login queue
body:
Everytime i tried to login it just say ''Unable to connect to login queue''.
What can i do to fix this

replies.body:
So I have actually been trying to log-in for awhile now... I have realized that if I create a new account on the Oceania server, I am able to log in through the client. Though with the NA server, I keep getting the same, "Unable to connect to login queue."

I'm not sure why that is...
I am in the West Coast and am still getting the same message. I was able to play yesterday, but not today. "Unable to connect to login queue."
Hey guys, it looks like there were some issues last night for some players routing through the west coast.  Everything should be okay now, and access to logging in restored.
I am in Florida and I have been having connection issues since last night.
SAME!!!!!! i dont know whats happening!!!! its been happening to me since 3 hours, did it get fixed for you?
same thing is happening to me I cant contact riot support as well every I login it just tells me to VERIFY my account what??{{item:3070}}
